intro: Brachystelma praelongum, commonly known as the long-stemmed stonecrop, is a member of the family Apocynaceae. It is a succulent plant native to South Africa, typically found in rocky or sandy habitats. The plant features short, fleshy stems and small, clustered flowers that range in color from yellow to orange. Its leaves are often thick and waxy, adapted to store water in arid environments. Brachystelma praelongum is popular among succulent enthusiasts due to its ornamental appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
